General.Name: Sentronic International
General.Description: Sentronic International Corp. provides semiconductor components, liquid crystal displays, optical read heads, light-emitting diodes, micro motors, decentralized components, etc. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 93, Xintai 5th Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 221
